name: Garden Drummer
description:
Dispel illusions by doing some rhythm funkery!

An evil flower is trying to take over someone’s garden.  The gardener is the only one who can stop this madness. 

Press [SPACE] to hit the beat. Press [K] to start the first level.

Hit the yellow pollen! Hit the ghost pollen too.  Avoid the purple poison!

Made by 

Mustan, RedWool, and Maverick
